feed.title: Simón Calle Laverde - Portfolio 2020
feed.subtitle: Hello, I'm Simón Calle Laverde, a web developer and web designer with 5 years of experience in web development and 5 years of studies in marketing and advertisement. I build modern hand-crafted websites that stand out! I have a background in marketing and advertisement, including branding and copywriting. I use design, copy, and the latest technologies in 2020 to create awesome websites that are thought to sell.
